title: Starts of the Week + Week 4 Breakdown, Air Yard Analysis - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/30
description:
Week 4 is here and The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason dive into Week 4 matchups and reveal their Starts of the Week! Plus, injury updates, and an air yards deep dive during “Never Not Working!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 30th, 2021.
  
 (04:25) - Never Not Working
 (13:35) - NFL News 
 (23:15) - Fantasy Forecast
 (23:50) - Washington Football Team at Falcons
 (29:55) - Texans at Bills
 (33:00) - Lions at Bears
 (37:40) - Panthers at Cowboys
 (44:40) - Colts at Dolphins
 (50:00) - Browns at Vikings
 (53:10) - Giants at Saints
 (58:40) - Starts of the Week
 (58:45) - QB Starts of the Week
 (01:01:15) - RB Starts of the Week
 (01:03:15) - WR Starts of the Week
 (01:04:35) - TE Starts of the Week
 (01:06:00) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
